about_the_game:
What would you do if everyone in your town decided to eat you? And no... it's not what you're imagining. Fight for your survival against an army of cannibals and try to escape this nightmare. A journey full of action and comedy, exclusively for adults.

Andreas Baker is a 26-year-old young man studying psychology. He works as a cook at his parents' bakery and is the one who pays the household bills. He is responsible, honest, fair, authentic, and extremely intelligent.

Alessa Baker is a 24-year-old young woman who neither studies nor works, living off her brother. She is immature, egocentric, opportunistic, rude, selfish, manipulative, fake, dishonest, irresponsible, reckless, and the list goes on endlessly.

Part of the residences in Gaillardia City were placed under quarantine due to issues with water contamination from the nearby Soda Paradise Factory. This led to the emergence of a mysterious disease in which the infected showed symptoms of irritability, aggressiveness, hypersensitivity to light and touch, repeated movements such as teeth grinding and tongue rolling, changes in posture like lowered heads or difficulty standing, and the onset of moderate hunger.

The city mayor forcibly quarantined the residences that received the contaminated water, and the Baker siblings' apartment was one of them. A health surveillance team was periodically sent to the locked-down residences to provide food, medical assistance, and examinations. A reinforced security team always accompanied the surveillance team in case of aggressiveness from the infected.

The game begins in the Baker siblings' apartment, where they had already been following this quarantine routine for about a month. A week had passed without any visit from the surveillance agents. With their food supplies running out and sensing something unusual about the agents' absence, they decide to find ways to leave the apartment and explore the city in search of answers and food.

Black Eye, the most powerful company in the world, holds considerable administrative influence over the most influential companies globally, being the majority shareholder in each of them.

State Bank, the most powerful bank in the world.

Front Investments, the largest investment fund manager in the world and the second-largest provider of ETFs after Black Eye.

Together, these three names form the most powerful cartel in all of human history.

Baker Bros' Quarantine is a politically incorrect game that uses dark humor to make harsh critiques of society, touching on controversial and current topics, inviting the player to deeply reflect on what is being said.

Embark on an adventure filled with action and raw, no-frills humor that aims to discuss important issues about the world we live in. And the best part is, this game had no input from sweet departments that seek to distort and destroy works in the name of 'diversity.'

content_descriptors.notes: General Mature Content. Contains strong language, mature humor, violence and gore, and suggestive themes.
